forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 8 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 10 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
A gentle clarity blankets Downtown San Francisco this morning, as the sun makes its slow ascent through a sky touched with soft wisps of cloud. The day dawns mostly sunny, promising a high of around 66, though the temperature will gracefully fall to a cooler 64 as the hours drift lazily by. Beneath a west-southwest breeze, the city's iconic skyline, standing proud, appears sharp and vivid today, adorned by the playful shimmer of light glancing off the rooftops. The wind, a lively companion, meanders through the streets, gusting at times, reminding onlookers of the delicate interplay between land and sea.

As the sun begins its descent this evening, clouds will gather, cultivating a cozy shroud around a low of 57. Dress in layers, perhaps a lightweight jacket that can easily manage the transition from day to night, ensuring comfort against the brisk air that tends to sweep in once darkness falls. With this weather, one might find pleasure in a serene stroll along the Embarcadero, or slip into a quaint café to savor a warm drink while watching the day’s hues mingle with the encroaching evening. The beauty of today beckons one to embrace the outdoors, to take a moment to breathe in the refreshing air, before the fog rolls in to blanket the city in its characteristic embrace.
